Policies and Initiatives.title: MoU Exchanged to Establish Krishnamurthy Tandon School of Artificial Intelligence at IIM Ahmedabad
Policies and Initiatives.summary: A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) has been exchanged to establish the Krishnamurthy Tandon School of Artificial Intelligence at IIM Ahmedabad. This new school will focus on artificial intelligence and is named after its benefactors. The establishment aims to promote research and education in the field of AI.

Policies and Initiatives.title: 1cr outlay for AI in Ahmedabad civic schools
Policies and Initiatives.summary: The Ahmedabad civic body has allocated Rs 1 crore for the implementation of artificial intelligence in its schools. This initiative aims to enhance the education system and provide students with exposure to AI technology. The allocation is part of the civic body's efforts to modernize and improve the quality of education in its schools.

Policies and Initiatives.title: Now, AI to identify stray cattle in Ahmedabad, track owners
Policies and Initiatives.summary: The Ahmedabad city administration is utilizing AI technology to identify stray cattle and track their owners. This initiative aims to address the issue of stray cattle roaming the streets, causing accidents and other problems. The AI system will help authorities to locate and reunite the stray cattle with their owners.

Major AI Developments.title: IIM-A gets Rs 100cr endowment to establish school of AI
Major AI Developments.summary: The Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIM-A) has received a Rs 100cr endowment to establish a school of artificial intelligence (AI). This significant funding will enable the institute to set up a dedicated school focused on AI research and education. The endowment is expected to enhance IIM-A's capabilities in the field of AI and related technologies.

Major AI Developments.title: Saved by seconds: ISR working on AI-based quake early warning system for Gujarat
Major AI Developments.summary: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISR) is developing an AI-based earthquake early warning system for Gujarat. The system aims to provide critical seconds of warning to people in the event of an earthquake, potentially saving lives. The AI technology will help detect seismic activity and alert authorities and the public quickly.

Major AI Developments.title: Tatas to make chips, laptops for Intel in Gujarat, Assam
Major AI Developments.summary: Tata Electronics will manufacture Intel's advanced AI laptop chips and employ cutting-edge packaging technologies at its new facilities in Gujarat and Assam. This collaboration aims to boost India's semiconductor ambitions and enhance cost-effectiveness for Intel. The partnership will also accelerate market entry for Intel, capitalizing on India's growing AI PC demand.

AI Start-Up News.title: How this deeptech startup is driving seaweed cultivation along the western coast of India
AI Start-Up News.summary: ClimaCrew, a Mumbai-based deeptech startup, is promoting seaweed cultivation along India's western coast by partnering with coastal communities and industries. The company uses an AI-driven platform to analyze satellite data and identify suitable locations for seaweed cultivation. This initiative aims to harness the nutritional potential of seaweed in Gujarat and Maharashtra.
